verbs.description: [V: antonio] [ARGM-MNR: brown] told police 80k gun were stolen from apartment antonio brown is facing a lawsuit stemming from his actions at a high - end apartment complex back in april and the alleged meltdown he had apparently came as a result of him discovering someone had stolen a lot of money and a firearm from him tmz obtained a copy of a lawsuit on tuesday that shows brown is being sued by a man who says the pittsburgh steelers star nearly killed a 22-month - old child when he began throwing items and furniture off antonio brown antonio brown wide receiver born 1988
